data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 1 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 1


This product depicts 50 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Adult Blue Dragon, Ambush Drakes, Commoner Children, both male and female. Commoner Adults, both male and female, Dragonborn, Kobolds, Flying Kobolds, Cultists, both male and female, Acolytes, both male and female, Guards, Rats, Defenders, Dragonclaws, and Clerics.

This Token Pack includes:

  • 4 Commoner Boys
  • 4 Commoner Girls
  • 4 Commoner Woman
  • Dragonclaw
  • Female Acolyte
  • Female Commoner with Spear
  • Governor
  • Half-Orc Guard
  • Human Female Cultist
  • 3 Human Male Cultists
  • Human Male Guard
  • 4 Kobolds with Dagger
  • 4 Kobolds with Slings
  • Male Acolyte
  • Male Commoner Wounded
  • Male Half-Elf Priest
  • Male Red Shield-Dwarf
  • 4 Male Town Defenders with Crossbow
  • Male Town Defender with Polearm
  • Male Town Defender with Sword
  • 4 Ambush Drakes
  • Female Head Cleric
  • Flying Kobold
  • Male Dragonborn Champion
  • Swarm of Rats
  • 3 Adult Blue Dragons

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 05, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 1This product depicts 50 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Adult Blue Dragon, Ambush Drakes, Commoner Children, both male and female.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
